Name: Non-Disclosure Agreement
Description: Welcome to the Confidentiality Agreement interview! This will produce a document which binds one party to keep confidential any information it receives from another party during the course of work.\n\nThis is for use when an Organisation has a Contractor coming on board to do some work, and they want to ensure that any confidential information the Contractor encounters will stay just that - confidential!

Steps.Name: Organisation
Steps.Description: The Organisation in this instance is the party providing the confidential information. Please tell us a bit about who the Organisation is.

Inputs.Name: Organisation name
Inputs.Description: What is the name of the organisation?

Inputs.Name: Organisation description
Inputs.Hint: The Organisation "operates a carpet manufacturing factory in Stratford", "runs a boutique wedding dress outlet store"

Steps.Name: Contractor
Steps.Description: Is the Contractor an individual person or a business/company?

Inputs.Name: Contractor name
Inputs.Description: What is the full legal name of the contractor?

Inputs.Name: Town of residence
Inputs.Description: What is the contractor's town of residence?

Steps.Name: Company information
Steps.Description: Enter details about the contracting company

Steps.Name: Reason for disclosure of confidential information
Steps.Description: Why does the Contractor need access to the confidential information?

Inputs.Hint: To provide marketing services to the Organisation

Steps.Name: Other access of confidential information
Steps.Description: Other than the Contractor's employees, will anyone else have access to the confidential information?

Steps.Name: Access given to
Steps.Description: Not including employees, who else will have access to the confidential information?

Steps.Name: Representative for {{contractory.company.name}}
Steps.Description: Provide information about the person who is signing this document on behalf of {{contractor.company.name}}

Inputs.Name: Representative name
Inputs.Description: What is the full legal name of the representative?

Inputs.Name: Email
Inputs.Description: What is the email of the representative? The representative will be emailed a link of the contract to sign.

Steps.Name: {{contractor.person.name}}'s email
Steps.Description: What is the {{contractor.person.name}}'s email? They will be emailed a link of the contract to sign.
